name: Ouroboros Archer Arena
description:
Ourobors Archer Arena is an arena full of archers and you only have one thing to do... Survive as many waves as you can! The cycle won't be over, though.

Art assets are originally from OpenGameArt.org (some of the art has been altered). Music and sound effects also have a CC0 license.

The game has been made in 48 hours for JimJam #2 and it's been developed by a solo developer.
